scripts.docker:build: docker build -t harshithd/sentinel-app-builder:latest -f Dockerfile.build . && docker build -t harshithd/sentinel-master:latest -f Dockerfile.master . && docker build -t harshithd/sentinel-executor-cpp:latest -f dockerfiles/Dockerfile.cpp . && docker build -t harshithd/sentinel-executor-java:latest -f dockerfiles/Dockerfile.java . && docker build -t harshithd/sentinel-executor-javascript:latest -f dockerfiles/Dockerfile.javascript . && docker build -t harshithd/sentinel-executor-python:latest -f dockerfiles/Dockerfile.python . && docker build -t harshithd/sentinel-executor-typescript:latest -f dockerfiles/Dockerfile.typescript .
scripts.docker:push: docker push harshithd/sentinel-app-builder:latest && docker push harshithd/sentinel-master:latest && docker push harshithd/sentinel-executor-cpp:latest && docker push harshithd/sentinel-executor-java:latest && docker push harshithd/sentinel-executor-javascript:latest && docker push harshithd/sentinel-executor-python:latest && docker push harshithd/sentinel-executor-typescript:latest
